Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add challenge path system for quest prestige

- Created challenge_paths.json for configuring special prestige paths
- Added admin commands: !quest challenge activate/deactivate/list/reload
- Players at level 20 can use !quest prestige challenge
- Challenge paths stored in player state
- Profile display shows active challenge path
- System ready for custom challenge configurations

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add abilities system for challenge path rewards

- Added abilities definitions in challenge_paths.json (doctor, bloodlust, rally)
- Implemented !quest ability command to list/use unlocked abilities
- Added ability cooldown tracking with expiry times
- Challenge completion tracking at level 20
- Track medkit usage per prestige for challenge validation
- Automatic ability unlock on challenge completion
- Example abilities:
  * Doctor: Heal all injuries in channel (weekly cooldown)
  * Rally: Restore 5 energy to all players (48h cooldown)
  * Bloodlust: Party-wide win chance buff (72h cooldown)
- Reset challenge stats on new prestige

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
